articles.description: Piers was accused of 'bullying' MP Helen Whately
articles.content:
TV's Piers Morgan has been issued a message from Ofcom after thousands of complaints were made about him.
The presenter has come under fire for his interviews with Care Minister Helen Whately on Good Morning Britain.
Almost 2,000 people complained over an i… [+3740 chars]

articles.author: Naomi Corrigan
articles.title: The Killers announce new Riverside Stadium date after confirming postponement - Gazette Live
articles.description: The Hot Fuss hitmakers said all UK and Ireland gigs will not go ahead this year due to to Covid-19.
articles.content:
The Killers have confirmed their sell-out Riverside Stadium concert will be postponed until 2021.
In a Tweet, the US rockers said they are not cancelling, and the show will instead go ahead on Thursday, June 10, 2021.
 The scheduled Middlesbrough show on Ju… [+2010 chars]

articles.title: Big Night In fundraising: How much was raised? Can you still donate? - Express
articles.description: BIG NIGHT IN raised millions of pounds to support vulnerable people during the coronavirus outbreak and fans were left gobsmacked at the final total. How much was raised? Can you still donate?

articles.title: Beyonce donates $6m to coronavirus relief effort in US cities - Manchester Evening News
articles.description: Money will be going to frontline workers and people affected by the pandemic
articles.content:
Beyonce has joined forced with Twitter CEO Jack Dorsey to donate six million dollars (£4.9 million) to the coronavirus relief effort.
The pop singer's BeyGood foundation announced the donation on Thursday, with the money going to frontline workers and people… [+1223 chars]

articles.title: Too Hot To Handle star Harry Jowsey spills details on sex act with Francesca - Mirror Online
articles.description: Netflix has found a reality TV hit in the form Too Hot To Handle and tall Aussie Harry Jowsey had quite the impact on Francesca Farago
articles.content:
One of the stars of Too Hot To Handle has spilt details on a now infamous sexual encounter he had on the show.
Tall Aussie model Harry Jowsey, 23, failed to stick to the celibacy rules on a number of occasions across the Netflix show's run.
